title: Roasted Beet Packages with Horseradish Butter
ingredients: 1/2cup (1 stick) unsalted butter, at room temperature
directions: 1. Preheat the oven to 375Â°F. Put the beets in a bowl and toss with enough olive oil to coat.

2. Place four beet halves and a thyme sprig on a thick square of aluminum foil. Season with sea salt flakes and black pepper. Wrap in a loose package, sealing the edges well. Repeat with the remaining beets.
3. Cook the beets in the preheated oven for about 1 hour, or until you can pierce the beets with a toothpick.
4. Meanwhile, make the horseradish butter. Mash all the ingredients with a fork, mixing well. Scrape the mixture onto a piece of plastic wrap and form into a log. Chill in the refrigerator.
